title: after updating my samsung note 8 phone to android 9.0 the alarm doesn't work I use original clock!
content: some days ago I updated my note 8 phone to android 9.0 and after that the clock alarm doesn't work. I set it up every night for waking up early morning but it doesn't work and I have to set up another device! what can I do? I cleared catch and storage but it didn't help.
